dt: {bc}a framed opening made in a chimney to hold an open fire {bc}{sx|hearth||}
{bc}a metal container with a smoke pipe used for the same purpose
{bc}an outdoor structure of brick, stone, or metal for an open fire

shortdef: a framed opening made in a chimney to hold an open fire : hearth; also : a metal container with a smoke pipe used for the same purpose
an outdoor structure of brick, stone, or metal for an open fire
